document_data.name: Olma
document_data.mainbody: '''Olma''' was a streetwalker and criminal in [[Calaunt]].
document_data.Description: Olma was blonde, wore thick, visible [[makeup]], with flashy spangles on gauze clothes. She had a sweet [[perfume]]; overall, she was rather fleshy.
document_data.Personality: Olma was relatively cool-headed even with a weapon to her throat.{{cite dragon/320/New in Town|65-68}}
document_data.Possessions: Besides her makeup, Olma had used some dust to attack Taegan which caused sneezing; it may have been ''[[dust of sneezing]]''.
document_data.History: Olma lured [[Taegan Nightwind]] to an ambush on behalf of [[Falar Aporos]]. Later, as Taegan realized that she had done it for Falar, he sought her again, and extracted the plan from her; a day later, he interrogated her as to Falar's location, and used her as a diversion once he reached the criminal.
